While there is currently no cure for AMD, there are therapies available to help slow the progression of the condition.",GARD,Macular degeneration
What is (are) Levator syndrome ?,"Levator syndrome is characterized by sporadic pain in the rectum caused by spasm of a muscle near the anus (the levator ani muscle). The muscle spasm causes pain
